contact.title_1: Review the symptoms you’ve experienced in the past 14 days.
contact.title_2: Review any locations you’ve visited in the past 14 days.
contact.title_3: Review people you’ve been in close contact with in the past 14 days.
contact.title_4: Please review and save this list for reference during your interview.
contact.desc_1: Sharing your symptoms helps your interviewer understand how long you’ve been sick, as well as the severity of your symptoms. Symptoms you’ve added are listed below.
contact.desc_2: Sharing locations you’ve visited helps your interviewer learn about places where other people may have been exposed to COVID-19. Include any locations you visited for 10 minutes or more. Locations you've logged are listed below.
contact.desc_3: Sharing the names of people you’ve had close contact with helps your interviewer determine who is most at risk for contracting COVID-19 from you. Include anyone you were within 6 feet of for 10 minutes or more. Contacts you've logged are listed below.
contact.desc_4: Please review the information below and save your list. You can always edit this list later.

missing_locations.title: Missing locations?
missing_locations.description: You can update today’s locations quickly by importing your location history from Google. This action will replace your current list and delete any notes you’ve added per location. This action cannot be undone.

global.privacyDisclaimer2: Information collected through CommonCircle Assist is stored securely and locally on your app, and remains private to you. Medical information provided throughout CommonCircle Assist is not a substitute for professional medical testing or advice.
global.logging: Location data is being collected and saved locally to your phone.
global.stopping: Turn on location logging to improve the accuracy of your notifications.
global.perm1desc: Receive notifications for exposure risks in your area.
global.setting1desc: You maintain control over how long we store your data. Delete your data at any time.
global.story1: CommonCircle Assist helps you protect yourself from risks and stay up to date on what’s happening near you, take care of yourself if you get sick, and record information that can help protect others if you get ill.
global.story2: Get notifications about locations near you where there’s a risk of COVID-19 exposure. You’ll also get critical alerts from your local health department, such as closures or cleanings of public spaces nearby.
global.story3: Take care of yourself and others. Get self-care tips, connect with the appropriate public health guidance if you've experienced symptoms, and log locations you recently visited to protect others.
global.story4: Any information you log in CommonCircle Assist is protected. Learn more about our approach on privacy in our FAQ.
global.startText: Let's slow the spread of COVID-19 together.
global.isolation1: Anyone who has tested positive for COVID-19 should remain in isolation until no longer infectious. For more information, please contact your local healthcare professional.
global.isolation2: Do not leave your home or recovery facility, except to receive medical care.
global.monitor1: If you have symptoms like cough, fever, or other respiratory problems, contact your regular doctor first.
global.monitor2: Do not go to the emergency room.
global.monitor3: Emergency rooms need to be able to serve those with the most critical needs. If you have difficulty breathing, it doesn’t mean you have novel coronavirus, but you should call 911.

location.visited_in_last_14_days: Locations you’ve visited in the last 14 days
location.description: Use location to filter notifications relevant to you. All location information is stored locally.
location.permission_title: CommonCircle Assist requires access to location information
location.pemission_description: Would you like to open app settings?

emergency.call_text: Call 911 immediately if you are having a medical emergency.

import.long_text:
Sync your location history
to get started.
import.description: Sync your location history directly from Google by importing your timeline data.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Medical information provided throughout CommonCircle Assist is not a substitute for professional medical testing or advice.

prepare.for_contact_tracer_interview: Prepare for your contact tracer interview
prepare.for_contact_tracer_description_text: During an interview, a public health official will collect a list of critical information to help identify those around you who may have been exposed.

what.to_do_if_you_are_sick: What to do if you are sick

symptoms.experienced_last_14_days: Symptoms you’ve experienced in the last 14 days

people.you_have_been_in_contact_last_14_days: People you’ve been in direct contact with over the last 14 days

socialize.text: Safely add people you’ve been in contact with directly from your contacts list, or add them one at a time.

ab.pain_desc: Pain from inside the abdomen or the outer muscle wall, ranging from mild and temporary to severe.

interview.preparation_description_text: You can use this app to collect information from the past 14 days to share with the interviewer. Select Get Started below to create your list.

export.title: Export
export.message: Local data with all records collected by CommonCircle Assist

data_storage_modal.title: Control your data storage
data_storage_modal.desc_1: Your privacy is important to us. We encourage you to retain your data so, if you test positive, you can use this information to quickly prepare for a contact tracing interview.
data_storage_modal.desc_2: You can always choose to delete your data completely from CommonCircle Assist. This action cannot be undone.

google.downloadFailed: There was a problem importing your location history from Google. Please try importing your locations again.
google.downloadSuccessful: Successfully Imported Location History from Google
google.noHistory: You don't have any location history on Google.
google.parsingFailed: There was a problem loading your location history from Google. Please try importing your locations again.
google.noDataFound: There was a problem loading your location history from Google. Please try importing your locations again.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Share analytics and crash data with CommonCircle Assist developers.
